[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Nat Set

abbrev omnimath2206_answer : ℝ := sorry
theorem omnimath2206 :
    IsLeast
      {y | ∃ α β : ℝ,
        y = (2 * Real.cos α + 5 * Real.sin β - 8) ^ 2 + (2 * Real.sin α + 5 * Real.cos β - 15) ^ 2}
      omnimath2206_answer :=
  sorry

This value corresponds to the minimal distance obtained when the sum of shifted sine and cosine forms is minimized; it fits the pattern of the enumerated solutions approaching approximately 129.66.
